name: Devil Band - Rock the Underworld
synopsis: Millions of demons and monsters emerge from the earth, destroying everything in their wake. Xavier, the most popular (and most evil) Death Metal rock band in the world, could be the only hope for the mankind... or the only nightmare for the devils! As the most evil force in the universe, you must find your way to enter hell, defeat the minions of evil and prove you are the true lord of all evil! You have to defeat waves of monsters in each stage: they will become stronger, but you can collect fanatic energy to summon or enhance your fans, or buy powerful music equipment for the band. Build your own dark army and destroy them all! Game Features: - Attack with band members and upgrade their abilities. - Summon Fan groups to defend against waves of monsters.
